devdoc.details: Store & retreive value in a variable

addBOQ(bytes32).details: Adds a new Bill of Quantity

addBillingItem(bytes32,bytes32).details: Pushes a new billing item to the stack

params._billingItem: The hash of the billing item
params._workItemId: The hash of the work item which emits payment when ready

addWorkItem(bytes32,bytes32).details: Pushes a new billing unit to the stack

params._id: The hash of the work item to be added

constructor.details: Instantiates a Contract Manager factory with initial values

setWorkItemProgress(bytes32,uint256).details: Sets the progress of a work item and all of its subitems to a predefined state

params._id: The hash of the work item to be updated
params._progress: The state as uint to set the progress of the work item (0=INITIALIZED, 1=STARTED, 2=STOPPED, 3=FINISHED)
